alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Windham County through 715 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newfane, or near Townshend, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Townshend, Putney, Westminster, Newfane, Dover, Marlboro, Jamaica, Wardsboro, Brookline, North Westminster, Wardsboro Center, South Newfane, Goose City, East Dummerston, East Putney, Fairview Village, Williamsville, East Dover and Four Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
